404.title: This content is currently unavailable
404.description: The author of the material may have distributed it only to a small group of people, changed its audience, or deleted it.

update.title: Outdated version
update.description: Yurba has been updated to version %s. Please update the web app for smooth work.

banned.title: Account blocked
banned.description:
You have been blocked for violating Terms of Use Yurba. Unblocked date: %s

If you do not agree with this, you can contact the email address: support@yurba.one

deleted.title: Account deleted
deleted.description:
You have deleted your account %s. You can restore it before the freeze expires.

Deletion deadline: %s.

disconnect.title: No connection
disconnect.description: Error connecting to the server, try reloading the page

post_not_found.title: Oops! This post does not exist.

comment_not_found.title: Oops! This comment does not exist.

default.title: Official profile
default.description: The administration of Yurba recognized %s profile as real

gov.title: Government account
gov.description: is an endorsed government agency, individual or company

org.title: Organization
org.description: is an official representative of the company or organization on Yurba

creative.title: Development Assistant
creative.description: %s has made creative contributions to the Yurba community

post_author.title: Post author
post_author.description: The comment is attributed to the author of the post

default.title: Official chat
default.description: The administration of Yurba recognized chat %s as real

sub_feature.title: YurbaPlus Feature
sub_feature.description: This feature is only available to YurbaPlus subscribers

prem_feature.title: Yurba Premium Feature
prem_feature.description: This feature is only available to YurbaPlus subscribers

branch.title: Branch
branch.description: This account is an affiliate of %s account.

0.title: Animated Icon
0.desc: Your profile will have the same animated icon as above. It will be next to your name.

1.title: Total Freedom
1.desc: Feel no limits! X3 Text limit in posts increased from 800 to 3000, in comments - from 200 to 600 characters.

2.title: Add All Your Friends
2.desc: X5 Limit on adding friends. Now the maximum is not 50, but 250 friends.

3.title: Out of Range
3.desc: Enable full anonymity mode – outsiders won't be able to see either your online status or your last login.

4.title: No Ads
4.desc: You won't see any ads from Yurba while using the network anymore.

5.title: Message Restriction
5.desc: Say 'no' to messages from strangers - allow messages only for friends and followers of Yurba.

7.title: Activity Viewing
7.desc: Get access to viewing the latest activity of other users, even while hiding yours.

0.title: More Media in Posts
0.desc: Now attachments in your post can contain up to 10 photos instead of 4.

1.title: Time to Write a Bio!
1.desc: Now you have an unlimited number of GOLink profiles, as well as up to 20 links and the ability to add covers for them.

2.title: Editable Icon
2.desc: Now you can set any emoji on your subscriber badge.

3.title: Access to Store
3.desc: Want to further personalize your profile? Great! Get access to an exclusive cosmetic store.

plus.buy: Hello! I would like to purchase a Yurba Plus subscription for 1 month.
plus.gift: Hello! I would like to purchase a Yurba Plus subscription as a gift for 1 month.

0.title: Subscriber Badge
0.desc: Your profile will have the same badge as above. It will be next to your name.

1.title: More Freedom
1.desc: X2 Text limit in posts increased from 800 to 1500, in comments - from 200 to 400 characters.

2.title: More Opportunities for Connections
2.desc: X2 Limit on adding friends. Now the maximum is not 50, but 100 friends.

3.title: Partial Concealment
3.desc: You'll be able to hide your last login from others with one click, but not your online status.

4.title: No Ads
4.desc: You won't see any ads from Yurba while using the network anymore.

5.title: Message Restriction
5.desc: Say 'no' to messages from strangers - allow messages only for friends and followers of Yurba.

0.title: More Media in Posts
0.desc: Now attachments in your post can contain up to 6 photos instead of 4.

2.title: Covers for Links
2.desc: Now you have the ability to add covers for links GOLink.

premium.buy: Hello! I would like to purchase a Yurba Premium subscription for 1 month.
premium.gift: Hello! I would like to purchase a Yurba Premium subscription as a gift for 1 month.

auth.title: Social network «Yurba»
auth.text1: Join Yurba and communicate with your family, friends, familiars and subscribers.
auth.text2: Share posts or create your own community in messenger to attract new audiences!
auth.android: Download our app on Android to always be in touch
auth.windows: App for personal computers on Windows

login.link: Don't have an account? Signup now

oauth.title: Grant Permission
oauth.description: App %s is requesting access to your account.

pos1.title: Access to basic data
pos1.description: The application will only have access to your basic data, such as ID, first name, last name, avatar and registration date.

pos2.title: Access ever
pos2.description: By having a limited token, the application can receive data at any time until you delete it.

pos3.title: Items that will not be accessed
pos3.description: The application does not have access to the password, IP and all other data, and will not be able to perform any actions with the account.

gd.title: Geometry Dash
gd.description: Integrated dashboard of Geometry Dash Void Server.

list.1: Request a linking through this form
list.2: Enter the received code in the game using the command !link [code]

register.title: Register a new Account
register.tof: I'm agree with GD Void Server's TOF

success.title: Success! The account is registered. You can log in to the game.

verification.title: Congratulations!
verification.default: You have received a check mark to your profile in the form of a verification check mark. Now you are 1 step closer to worldwide popularity
verification.org: Your organization has been officially verified. This means that you are now recognized as a full-fledged company/organization in Yurba.
verification.gov: Your page has been officially confirmed as a state page. This means that we have recognized that your page is official at the state level
verification.msg: Hello! I wish to be verified in Yurba.

notverify.title: Get verified in few steps!
notverify.about: If you think you're a mid-circle celebrity or a popular video blogger, musician or other content maker and you're sure you need a wingman, then read the terms and conditions and opportunities below

rec.title: Recognizability
rec.about: You must be popular. If you are famous in small circles - it is not suitable, because you must be famous in big circles and have a good reputation

comprof.title: Completed Profile
comprof.about: The profile you wish to verify must be fully filled out with valid and complete information to facilitate the verification process. You should also make it clear who you are, an individual or an organization. Only 'Relationship' and 'Native city' can be left blank

activity.title: Activity
activity.about: You must publish at least 1 post per week in order not to lose verification. It is best that these posts be as meaningful as possible

censor.title: Censorship
censor.about: Preferably, do not publish posts with extreme amounts of profanity and/or insults. Try to keep your posts as 'user-friendly' as possible

fol.title: First on the list
fol.about: Verified profiles will always come up first in searches, if possible. This gives you a better chance of finding a popular person

nomiss.title: There's no mistaking you
nomiss.about: Verification will let everyone know that you are you. Any check mark next to your name will mean that the person has gotten to the profile they were looking for

acts.desc: If you are sure that verification is right for you, then click on the 'Send your account for verification' button.

error.title: Error! There are insufficient funds on your balance.
